title: Rojavai Thaalattum Thendral Lyrics Ninaivellam Nithiya
stanzas:
Rojavai thaalattum thendral
pon megam nam pandhal
un koondhal en oonjal
un varthai sangeethangal

Rojavai thaalattum thendral
pon megam nam pandhal

ilaigalil kadhal kaditham
vandu ezhuthum poonjolai.
viralgalil meni muzhuthum
ilamai varaiyum or kavithai.(2)

mouname sammadham endru
venduthe manmatha vandu(2)

vasanthangal vazhthum pozhuthu
unadhu kilaiyil poo aaven.
ilaiudhir kaala muludhum
magzhinthu unaku ver aaven(2)

poovile methaigal thaipen
kannukkul mangaiyai vaippen(2)

Rojavai thaalattum thendral
pon megam nam pandhal
un koondhal en oonjal
un varthai sangeethangal

Rojavai thaalattum thendral
pon megam nam pandhal
